Header: Buzarnescu crushes Sakkari 6-1 6-0 to win in California
Content: Romanian Mihaela Buzarnescu stormed to an easy straight set win over Greeceâ€™s Maria Sakkari to win the WTA Silicon Valley Classic. The 6-1 6-0 drubbing was the first WTA Premier-level singles victory for the fifth-seeded Buzarnescu and ended a magical run through the field for unseeded Sakkari. The 30-year-old Buzarnescu is expected to move up to number 20 when the WTA rankings are released. Sakkari had claimed upset wins over Venus Williams and Danielle Collins to earn her first trip to a Premier-level final.
